summary: This code installs required dependencies and generates a TypeScript client for a FastAPI server using the openapi-typescript-codegen tool, based on the provided fastapi_openapi.json file.

details.comment: This code installs required dependencies and generates a TypeScript client for a FastAPI server using the openapi-typescript-codegen tool, based on the provided fastapi_openapi.json file.
details.content:
REM install the thing first.
REM npm i -g openapi openapi-typescript-codegen 
openapi --file fastapi_openapi.json --output-dir typescript_fastapi_client
